alert.note: Alert for Lower Hells Canyon, Salmon River Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 25 at 10:56AM MDT until October 26 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 AM PDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected above 2500 feet. Total snow accumulations up to one inch 2500 to 3500 feet and 1 to 2 inches 3500 feet and above. * WHERE...Lower Hells Canyon/Salmon River Region. Whitebird Hill. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 5 AM PDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Lower Hells Canyon, Salmon River Region
